org.gbif.common.search.service

Class SolrSearchService<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,ST extends T,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.common.search.service.SolrSearchService<T,P,ST,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the results that the search operation return using a SearchResponse
    P - the search parameter enum also used for facets
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.gbif.api.service.common.SearchService<T,P,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SolrSearchSuggestService

    public class SolrSearchService<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,ST extends T,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>>
extends Object
implements org.gbif.api.service.common.SearchService<T,P,R>
    Generic SearchService that encapsulates the communication with a SolrClient. The basic implementation of the service is a search operation that holds all the valid parameters. The response returned is basically information taken from the Solr QueryResponse. During the initialization time the class expects a SolrClient instance which depending on the configuration parameters is an remote or a embedded Solr server. Additionally, this class internally implements the necessary logic for accessing the mapped fields between Solr and the request object values; most of this is implemented by using annotations, enum types and java introspection. All the mapping handling is done by SearchResponseBuilder and SolrQueryBuilder.

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchResponse<T,P> search(R searchRequest)
